wployalty.name: WPLoyalty - Loyalty Points, Rewards & Referrals
wployalty.author: WPLoyalty
wployalty.description: Build customer loyalty and boost repeat sales with a loyalty rewards and referral program. Reward your customers with points for purchases, sign-ups, reviews, referrals, social shares, birthdays, and more, fostering lasting engagement and loyalty.

spark_editor.name: Spark Email Editor
spark_editor.author: emaileditorplus
spark_editor.description: Effortlessly customize WooCommerce and WordPress emails with our visual drag-and-drop editor. Quickly adapt one of our ready-made templates to match your branding. Compatible with popular WooCommerce plugins like WooCommerce Subscriptions, WooCommerce Bookings, WPLoyalty, and more. Fully multilingual-ready

upsellwp.name: UpsellWP - Upsells, Cross-sells, Order bumps
upsellwp.author: UpsellWP
upsellwp.description: Increase average order value with the All-in-one upsell plugin. Effortlessly integrate checkout upsells, order bumps, frequently bought together offers, one-click upsells, cart upsells, thank you page upsells, and added-to-cart popups. Tailor product recommendations to customer purchase behaviors and more.

wpbundle.name: WPBundle PRO
wpbundle.author: WPBundle
wpbundle.description: Boost your store revenue by presenting product bundles to your customers.

relay.name: Relay - Affiliate marketing
relay.author: WPRelay
relay.description: Supercharge your WooCommerce affiliate marketing â€“ manage affiliates, their referrals, track sales, and automate payouts with Relay effortlessly! Create unlimited affiliate & customer referral programs to drive word-of-mouth sales.

retainful.name: Retainful - Email Marketing & Cart Recovery
retainful.author: Retainful
retainful.description: The simplest, easiest-to-use email marketing, newsletter, cart recovery, signup forms and automation plugin for WooCommerce. Recover abandoned carts, send newsletters & email campaigns, automate order follow-up emails & grow email lists with signup forms, add-to-cart popups, exit popups and more.

side_cart.name: Side Cart for WooCommerce
side_cart.author: UpsellWP
side_cart.description: The ultimate WooCommerce side cart widget for faster checkout. Boost conversions by streamlining the checkout process and increase sales with targeted upsell and cross-sell offers. Get it free.
